Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Trump International Hotel Las Vegas in Las Vegas (West of The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a spa tub, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the resort's 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at Trump International Hotel Las Vegas in Las Vegas (West of The Strip), you'll be minutes from Fashion Show Mall and close to Las Vegas Convention Center. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of Sands Expo Convention Center and The Auto Collections.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fashion Show Mall - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
High Roller - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
The Linq - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Crystals at City Center - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Boulevard Mall - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Little White Wedding Chapel - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi

The preferred airport for Trump International Hotel Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Trump International Hotel Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.2 km / 3.3 mi.

RoomType.text: Double 1 Bedroom Penthouse Suite with Strip View

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: There is a mandatory resort fee of $35 (plus tax), per room, per night, payable directly to the hotel. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Superior King Room with City View

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

The property does not provide airport shuttle service. However, free area shuttle services are available to/from Wynn Casino and The Forum Shops at Caesars Palace. The shuttle service schedules are as follow:
- To and from Wynn Casino: 08:00 AM - 12:00 AM (Sunday-Thursday) and 08:00 AM - 02:00 AM (Friday-Saturday).
- To and from The Forum Shops at Caesars Palace: 08:00 AM - 12:00 AM daily.,American Express, Visa, Euro/Mastercard, Diners Club, Discover,A resort fee will be collected upon check-in.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
